thread.title: Adda Ka Dangal - New Rules and Regulations

author: Prashant Pandey (noreply@blogger.com)
title: Adda Ka Dangal - New Rules and Regulations
text: Adda Ka Dangal - New Rules and Regulations Dear Readers, For the convenience of our students, we have changed the rules and regulations of the show. The show will start at 12:00 Noon. Interested students can join using Adda247 YouTube Channel. The chat section will remain open for participation. The New Rules are given below: 1. Contestant can participate using YouTube Chat Section of Adda247 YouTube Channel. 2. Only Indian Citizens living in India are allowed to participate. 3. 10 Ques/ Day in MCQ based format with 4 Options. Participants will get 40 Seconds to answer each Ques. 4. Game will be Played from Monday-Friday. 5. Friday is the day of “Maha Dangal”. 6. There will be a Jackpot Question embedded among 10 questions. You can answer it by sending a text message with correct option to 8750505011. 7. You can answer the Jackpot Question till 6:00 pm. 8. One Lucky Winner will be selected everyday.
